title: ENTERPRISE COMPUTING DEVICE MANAGEMENT
description: This project is to enhance security of the District's computing environment and business operations to proctect against syber-attacks and malicious software and increase oversight and transparency of the District's hardware and software purchase through the use of LANDesk Secure User Management Suite.
justification: to enhance security of the District's computing environment and business operations to proctect against syber-attacks and malicious software and increase oversight and transparency of the District's hardware and software purchase through the use of LANDesk Secure User Management Suite
